text: I think people need to have fun with whatever they're doing - makeup, their clothes, music, live shows - anything you don't need to take too seriously, don't take too seriously.
author: Kesha

text: Rock 'n' roll music is what gets me off.
author: Joan Jett

text: When I listen to music, I don't want to hear about flowers. I like death and destruction.
author: Jonathan Davis

text: Music is the career I'm lucky enough to get paid for, but I have other desires and passions.
author: Layne Staley

text: I had spent many years pursuing excellence, because that is what classical music is all about... Now it was dedicated to freedom, and that was far more important.
author: Nina Simone
